nodes.text: A male individual was the father of the crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure. He was the son of Mama and Papa.

Jabba's father was first mentioned, albeit unnamed, in the current Star Wars canon in Star Wars Super Graphic: A Visual Guide to a Galaxy Far, Far Away, a reference book written by Tim Leong and published by Chronicle Books in 2017.

Within the Star Wars Legends continuity, Jabba's father was established as Zorba Desilijic Tiure, a Hutt crime lord. The character of Zorba first appeared in the 1992 novel Zorba the Hutt's Revenge, which was written by Paul and Hollace Davids and illustrated by Karl Kesel.
